Question: Navigation Instruction given at initial position: [take off and fly upwards same to the building height and take a turn and fly straight to the opposite building after reaching the building turn left. after turning left fly between the gap of the building and fly downwards to the lake and fly upwards from the lake and turn left and fly straight towards the building at the opposite and fly near to the entrance of the park. fly upwards and take a turn and start flying straight to the building at the opposite crossover the lake after reaching the building fly near the eds butcher shop and fly upwards and again take a turn. after taking a turn fly straight towards the tall building in the opposite fly at the same height of the building. after reaching the tall building turn right to the opposite of the building and start flying downwards continuously towards the lake fly downwards at the center of the lake.]. You move according to a series of movement instructions. What are you doing now?  
choose:  
A. I fly over buildings.  
B. I fly near Ed's Butcher Shop.  
C. I go to the chair between the buildings.  
D. I turn right at the building.  
E. I go across the water.
